ygData.subject: Re: Ice/ New battle
ygData.msgSnippet: Megaton didn t understand what could be happening to him, he was perfect, the ideal Pred. He tried to think logically, how was it that he hadn t transformed?

From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>

Megaton didn't understand what could be happening to him, he was perfect,
the ideal Pred. He tried to think logically, how was it that he hadn't
transformed? (He did but Ice's telepathy keeps him from knowing it.) He
turned around to where Ice lay, he knew that either her or Lunarpine were
causing this. He decided to try some more logic, "You haven't told them what
Veratis intends for the Maximals when his army of mutants are complete have
you?"

Lunarpine rushed to Ice's side, he could see her strain. "I don't know what
you're doing to him but I want you to stop before you hurt yourself." His
concern for her was interupted by Megatons comment about Veratis. "Shut up
monster or I'll show you whats in store for ANY traitor who comes around
me."
----- Original Message -----
From: <logomorph@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, March 21, 2001 11:23 AM
Subject: Re: Ice/ New battle


> Ice::
>
> She was flung through the air and landed on her tail.  She got up
> onto her feet and kept up with the mental image.  She gave him the
> idea that his skin was falling off his head.  She kept the image
> strong in his mind, but it was taxing her energy levels.  Her wing
> was leaking and her shoulder was throbbing, but she didn't stop.
>
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > OK, I'll start here,
> >
> > Megaton had caught himself off gaurd as well as Ice, he hadn't
> expected to
> > catch the other mutant. He swung his head to the side, tossing her
> out of
> > the way. Suddenly he fealt something in his head, he looked down it
> appeared
> > that he was falling apart. Just as he was ready to lash out in
> anger he came
> > to the unproven fact that he was Megaton, indestructible leader of
> the
> > Predacons. (In his mind anyway.) He looked back in the direction
> he'd tossed
> > Ice, "Do yourself a favor and quit while you're alive."
> >
> > Lunarpine used his speed to the best of his ability and raced up
> Megatons
> > back. he raised his claw to strike only to be blown away by a puff
> from the
> > dragons nostrils. "Bad dog, Stay down."
> > ----- Original Message -----
> > From: <logomorph@h...>
> > To: <nbwrpg@y...>
> > Sent: Tuesday, March 20, 2001 6:58 PM
> > Subject: Re: Ice/ New battle
> >
> >
> > > OOC:: thanks being easy on me here.
> > >
> > > Ice::
> > > She tried to dive out of the way, but the dragon got her by the
> > > wing.  She roared out as the teeth peirced the flesh and almost
> tore
> > > the wing from her shoulder.  She still swiped at him.  Then she
> tried
> > > another idea.  She closed her eyes, ignoring the pain, and sent
> the
> > > mental image of the dragon's scales starting to fall off.  Then
> the
> > > dragon's skin started to peel away. MEch fluid running fast down
> his
> > > body.  It was a grusome thought, but she tried hard to make the
> > > dragon think it was really happening. With luck, he'd gasp in fear
> > > and let her go.
> > >
> > >
> > >
> > >
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > > > Megaton stood tall taking the shot, his thick scales prevented
> any
> > > major
> > > > damage. Another shot, then another. The blows fealt like a few
> > > punches
> > > > instead of claws. The dragon was beginning to feal annoyed by
> the
> > > winged
> > > > polar bear swatting at him. Without warning the great beast
> snapped
> > > his head
> > > > forward, biting at Ice's puny body.
> > > >
> > > > ------------------------------------------------------
> > > >
> > > > ::Prowl::
> > > >
> > > > Prowl nods, weapons still ready. "Why did you come to the
> Maximal
> > > > base then?"
> > > >
> > > > The Dragon watches his playthings attacking as he spoke, "I
> came to
> > > make you
> > > > an offer you can't refuse." (Sorry couldn't resist) the mutant
> was
> > > almost
> > > > enjoying himself watching the other mutants futile attempts to
> hurt
> > > him.
> > > > "And as soon as anyone important shows up I'll make that offer
> > > yessssss" His
> > > > Megatron side was working it's way into his logic, this was one
> > > thing he'd
> > > > tried to avoid. The former Pred leader would have destroyed
> these
> > > bots
> > > > before the fight began but that would leave the faction weak.
> > > >
> > > > Lunarpine saw the futal attempts that Ice was using and
> transformed
> > > to his
> > > > half wolf mode. again he hit Megaton with his howl in the back.
> > > >
> > > > Megaton was caught off gaurd and forced forward, He remained on
> his
> > > feet and
> > > > swung backward at the wolf with his spiked tail. Lunarpine
> easily
> > > avoided it
> > > > by leaping straight up and over the tail.
> > >
> > >
> > >
